alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 10:53PM CDT until November 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Doyline to near Converse, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Coushatta, Ringgold, Campti, Heflin, Allen, Pleasant Hill, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Hall Summit, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Edgefield, Bienville, Jamestown, Powhatan and Bryceland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine; Webster
